entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -15.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the evening and overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
